snippet: Beijing will undertake a major restructuring of the capital government as part of a broader plan to create a giant urban corridor in northern China, officials said Saturday.

byline.contributor: Adam Wu contributed research from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Beijing will undertake a major restructuring of the capital government as part of a broader plan to create a giant urban corridor in northern China, officials said Saturday.

headline.main: Chinese Officials to Restructure Beijing to Ease Strains on City Center
